name: Greekit - UI Kit v1.0 (Demo)
description:
Greekit is a Figma UI Kit from us! Instead of creating everything from scratch, you will be getting ready-made components (with variants) to speed up your design process.


This kit also has global styles so you can change them according to your taste. We have also created few examples that can leverage the use of this kit.


We have further plans to add more components & examples in this kit so stay tuned!
